name: Mbona (M'bona)
shortLoreBlurb: Mbona (M'bona) is a spirit from Mang'anja (Malawi) associated with rain shrine, martyr. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Mbona (M'bona) is a spirit from Mang'anja (Malawi) associated with rain shrine, martyr. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
